tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_retina_scanning_data (
    employee_id INT,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    retina_scan_data BLOB,
    access_level CHAR(1)
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeRetinaScanning (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    retina_data BYTEA,
    scan_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE AccessControlLogs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    access_time TIMESTAMP,
    access_granted BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE SecurityClearance (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    clearance_level VARCHAR(50)
)
CREATE TABLE Employee { employee_id UUID, first_name STRING, last_name STRING, retina_scan_data BLOB, PRIMARY KEY (employee_id) }
CREATE TABLE Department { department_id UUID, department_name STRING, PRIMARY KEY (department_id) }
CREATE TABLE AccessLog { log_id UUID, employee_id UUID, access_time TIMESTAMP, access_result STRING, PRIMARY KEY (log_id), FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id) }
CREATE TABLE AccessRequest { request_id UUID, employee_id UUID, request_time TIMESTAMP, request_status STRING, PRIMARY KEY (request_id), FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employee(employee_id) }

CREATE TABLE EmployeeInformation (
    employee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    department VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    retina_scan_data BYTEA
);
